column4: hi, FF and chrome both flash plugin crash when trying to load express.paltalk, a web-based paltalk client. Anyone, advise me?
flash plugin crashes a lot here. anyone?>
flash is spotty on linux. Are you using 64 bit? Or 32?
I'm using default Ubuntu java and flash. It's working for me.
looks like I already have the newest version. And you're running sun's java or the opensource version which ubuntu is set to by default?
